name: Kolana
description: Kolana is a streamlined dashboard that combines trades, tweets, AI insights, and leaderboards into one coherent flow. Instead of overwhelming users with endless data, it focuses on high-signal information from curated wallets and social accounts. The platform provides live trades and tweets, a rotating AI TL;DR summarizing current trends, and clean performance leaderboards. By starting with the AI brief, checking top performers, scanning tweets, and confirming with trades, users can form a clear market view in just minutes. Built with Svelte, Vite, shadcn-svelte, PocketBase, and Lucide icons, Kolana is designed for speed, transparency, and responsive usability across devices.
